statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_analytics;
SELECT post_id, platform, post_date FROM social_media_analytics ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, shares FROM social_media_analytics WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT post_id, likes, shares FROM social_media_analytics WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT platform, COUNT(post_id) AS total_posts FROM social_media_analytics GROUP BY platform ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_analytics WHERE platform = 'Twitter' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_id, platform, post_date FROM social_media_analytics WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY likes DESC, post_date ASC;
SELECT platform, COUNT(*) AS total_posts, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM social_media_analytics GROUP BY platform ORDER BY total_likes DESC;
SELECT platform, AVG(likes) AS avg_likes, AVG(comments) AS avg_comments FROM social_media_analytics WHERE post_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY platform;

SELECT platform, MAX(likes) AS max_likes, MIN(likes) AS min_likes, MAX(comments) AS max_comments, MIN(comments) AS min_comments FROM social_media_analytics WHERE shares > 50 GROUP BY platform ORDER BY max_likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 1000 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT post_id, likes_count, comments_count FROM post_analytics WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count + following_count AS total_activity FROM social_media_users;

SELECT user_id, username, followers_count, following_count, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_users JOIN post_analytics ON social_media_users.user_id = post_analytics.user_id WHERE followers_count > 500 ORDER BY comments_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, followers_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > 100 AND following_count > 50 ORDER BY followers_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT post_id, user_id, likes_count, comments_count, post_date FROM post_analytics WHERE likes_count > 100 AND post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, followers_count, following_count FROM social_media_users WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT username, followers_count FROM social_media_users WHERE followers_count > following_count;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT post_id, shares, timestamp FROM performance_metrics WHERE shares > 100;
SELECT post_id, comments, likes FROM performance_metrics WHERE comments < 10 AND likes > 50;
SELECT * FROM user_analytics WHERE total_posts > 50 ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY likes DESC, timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT post_id, comments, shares FROM performance_metrics WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY shares DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT pm.post_id, pa.total_likes, ph.engagement_rate FROM performance_metrics pm JOIN user_analytics pa ON pm.post_id = pa.user_id JOIN post_history ph ON pm.post_id = ph.post_id WHERE pm.likes > 100 AND ph.views > 50 ORDER BY likes DESC, engagement_rate DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT pm.post_id, pm.likes, ph.impressions, pa.total_shares FROM performance_metrics pm JOIN user_analytics pa ON pm.post_id = pa.user_id JOIN post_history ph ON pm.post_id = ph.post_id WHERE pm.likes > 50 AND pa.total_shares > 20 ORDER BY pm.likes DESC, total_shares DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT pa.user_id, pa.total_posts, SUM(pm.likes) AS total_likes, SUM(ph.views) AS total_views FROM user_analytics pa LEFT JOIN performance_metrics pm ON pa.user_id = pm.post_id LEFT JOIN post_history ph ON pm.post_id = ph.post_id GROUP BY pa.user_id ORDER BY total_posts DESC, total_likes DESC, total_views DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data;
SELECT username, post_content, likes_count FROM social_media_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM user_details ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY reach DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM social_media_data WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM social_media_data WHERE shares_count > 50 ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM user_details WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM campaign_data WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT post_id, engagement_rate, impressions, clicks FROM performance_metrics WHERE reach > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM analytics_data;
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes, comments FROM post_details ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT username, followers, following FROM user_details WHERE join_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, likes, shares, impressions FROM engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 1001;
SELECT ad_id, platform, conversions, spend FROM ad_performance ORDER BY clicks DESC;
SELECT * FROM analytics_data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, likes, impressions FROM analytics_data WHERE user_id = 12345 AND post_id = 54321;
SELECT post_content, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM post_details GROUP BY post_content HAVING total_likes > 500 ORDER BY total_likes DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT u.username, p.post_content, e.comments FROM user_details u INNER JOIN post_details p ON u.user_id = p.user_id INNER JOIN engagement_metrics e ON u.user_id = e.user_id WHERE p.location = 'New York' ORDER BY e.comments ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT ad_id, platform, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM ad_performance WHERE campaign_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' GROUP BY ad_id, platform HAVING total_clicks > 1000 AND total_conversions > 100 ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
